message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  Given its value, I'm offering it to you for $16,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice,  While I appreciate your offer, $16,000 is out of my budget.  I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $10,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $16,000 is still too high. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $14,500? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be a worthwhile investment for you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $14,500 is still too high for me.  I'm really serious about getting this product, but I can't go higher than $11,000. What do you say?

Bob, thanks for the offer, and I appreciate you working with me on the price. To be honest, $11,000 is cutting it a little too close to my bottom line.  Could we meet in the middle at $13,000? This would be my final offer.
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $13,000 is still too high for me.  My absolute maximum is $11,500.  I really want to buy this product, but I can't go higher.  What do you think?
